item.title: paletter speech
item.description: On november 20th 2018 I was requested to make a keynote speech at the 9th MilanoR meeting, the most relevant italian meeting of R users. The main topic of the speech was one of my last coding fatigues: the Paletter package, a new R package able to derive an optimised colour palette from any kind of image. You can also find a kind reportage of the evening directly on the official MilanoR blog, and the full deck of slides online.
